review: Dr Sakshi.. words are not enough to thank her.. *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ***.. I was 49kg when I got pregnant and everyone told me that I will have a C-section delivery but trust me she was the only one who helped me throughout my pregnancy and prepared me for normal delivery. I had delivered my baby normally without any medicated relief procedure and I had her support throughout my pregnancy and also during labor . Apart from my mother she was the one on whom I relied completely.. I’ll blindly suggest her to everyone looking for a good gynaecologist in Delhi especially when you want to have a normal delivery. Dr Sakshi I owe you my normal delivery ♥️ and whenever God will bless me with second baby I shall come to you only no what in what corner of the world I will be ♥️♥️

Doctor is very friendly and talks very positively.
She gave ample time to discuss and guided in all ways.  She makes one feel very comfortable. I liked her behavior,  her voice and everything about her.

She had a very vast excellent experience of Gyane. Me and my wife met her first time in emergency, our cases was sensitive, but Dr. Goel handled it very well, everyone was suggested C section but she had different plan and took place a successful normal delivery. She came at 2 am at night in the hospital specially for our case. Thanks Dr. Goel *** *** *** ****

*** ** **** **** ****** listen very carefully and suggest what is recommended. She is polite with zero attitude and solve my queries whenever I message her . She always gives time to me  and never panic her patients. Very positive attitude towards her patients and very motivating .

As my last visit with my wife to another doctor didn't go well, I was skeptical about this visit. But allow me to inform first that it has gone well as expected. She was very nice and polite to start the conversation. She heard our side of story, removed unnecessary medication and suggested what I was expecting. I confirmed everything from my family doctor (lucky to have a cousin playing this role for us) for second opinion. Recommending the doctor to everyone.
